attributes.action: End the protest Bloodshed in Iran,help Iranian’s to gain safety and freedom
attributes.additional_details:
Iran is falling apart, everyday people are dying under the governments hands with violence , shooting.People are fighting for freedom it’s been 40 years.Women are being killed for not wearing a dress code properly.Students are held in hostage for protesting.Iran’s government turned the internet off, to silence this protest. Iran has oil and resources, it can help Uk if the Islamic republic is banned.Iran is against human right, lgbt,other religions,living.
Over 100 people have died in 2 weeks. Help Iran please.
attributes.background: To look at the issue in Iran’s government, stop the bloodshed, put pressure on Iran’s government, give safety to the young people in Iran.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Maintain sanctions and introduce visa ban on people linked to Iranian regime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623572

Cut diplomatic ties with Iran in support of current nationwide uprisings: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623743

Condemn Iran for human rights violations linked to the regime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623749
